name: Turn Them Purple
description:
Match 3 game but you make your matched soldiers fight when ready.

Merge soldiers of the same color to make them stronger and faster. Reach the maximum upgrade to turn them purple and use three special abilities in fight.

With every level you'll get one more move. Over time you will get more special attacks and can use more advanced strategies.

Compete on a leader board. This game is endless so you can enjoy it forever!
